title: Cube of Trevalia
description: After her husband is killed when a severe electrical storm causes the cabin he's in to burn to the ground, Kate Tucker must sell their house and move to her brother-in-law's farm with her two children. Despite resistance from her teen daughter Susan, the move into the old farmhouse is going well. At least that's what Kate and her brother-in-law Ethan both think, until Danny, Kate's youngest, takes an uncontrollable interest in the curious metal box discovered many years ago on the farm - the same metal box that was present when Seth was killed. The four of them converge on the box just as it comes to life, surrounding them with blinding light mixed with electricity and the sound of a strong wind. When it finally stops, the Tucker family find themselves somewhere other than where they fully expected to be. Now faced with an unknown world full of dangers, they begin the search for a way back home. But they aren't the only ones looking for the magical artifact that might make a return possible...
author: L.J. Capehart
